text: Mielnik () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bystrzyca Kłodzka, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945, it was in Germany. It lies approximately north of Bystrzyca Kłodzka, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital of Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Mielnik, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
